title: League slowing down PC as of 7.22
body: Opening the client (the log in screen) is causing my entire pc to sort of lag out. My audio (in game and out game) crackles and stutters, opening and loading things takes longer or freezes my pc for a few seconds. In game my fps has dropped from near 120 constant to 1--40, usually around 20-30, but spikes to what feels like below 1 fps. At the moment it is bordering unplayable, any suggestions or ideas on whats causing this?

replies.body: We've noticed some issues with [**in-game FPS after patch 7.22**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lZv6E2Xz-update-on-fps-issues-in-722-and-723), but this kinda seems more related to either your pc having problems running league due to specs or the client files being damaged. Try running a quick repair to check up on those files and let me know if that helps at all.

This has been happening to me and a bounty of other people. Riot can't figure out what's causing it and there's no ETA as to when it will be solved. 
It has gotten to the point where I can't even play League since 7.22, and I'm hoping they will hotfix this ASAP when they do figure out what's going on.
